item.title: Artist Map
item.description: This interactive map shows the birth and formation location of nearly sixty thousand musicians and musical ensembles. Artist Map Try it in your browser! View the Source Code Leaflet JS Map The map data is displayed using Leaflet JS - a flexible front end for map data. The map tiles are sourced from Open Street Map. WikiData Data is queried from WikiData a service that enables SPARQL queries on a database generated from the article text of Wikipedia articles.
